forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 14. Northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 27. West wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Boston, the sky unfolds a cloak of clarity, punctuated by the distant twinkling of city lights. The air carries a brisk chill, whispering promises of the deep winter that embraces the city tonight. With temperatures dipping around 14 degrees, the northwest winds add an invigorating edge, making for a night best enjoyed from within the warmth of cozy interiors—or perhaps wrapped snugly in layers should one step outside to gaze at the stars and ponder the quietude of the evening. 

As dawn breaks tomorrow, expect a transformation. The sun will rise in brilliant defiance of the chill, illuminating Boston with warm rays and lifting spirits with a high approaching 27 degrees. It will be a splendid day, one that begs for a leisurely stroll through the crisp streets or a gentle bike ride down historic boulevards. Attire should favor layers—thick socks and a sturdy coat to embrace the coolness of the morning, shedding them later as the day brings a comfortable warmth. Engage with the day, perhaps indulging in a warm cup of coffee on a nearby terrace or exploring the unique charm of local shops, basking in the winter sun while appreciating the serene beauty that this city offers in the colder months.
